MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY23 and SY25 postcode areas of Cwmystwyth and Pontrhydygroes, affecting a number of properties in the local area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 9:02 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:05 pm on 19th January, 2021.
